name: Gravity Run (itch) (Saahil Talha)
description:
Gravity Run - a game that uses the force of Gravity! Floating Cars? Spikes? We can easily avoid them by just switching gravity! Coins? Collect them by switching gravity! What are you waiting for?

--Instructions--

=> WASD or ARROW keys to move;

=> COLLECT coins and big coins;

=> AVOID spikes and rockets;

=> TRY to GET high score;

=> Have Fun!

Extra - Consider buying me a coffee ☕ before downloading the game!
